events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System has categorized the issue as a refund request based on customer keywords.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service specialist to assist you with your refund.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received for verification?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached the photo of the wrong item here.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
Your refund has been successfully processed and should appear on your payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
We are closing this case now. Please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
